title: Land for sale in Panadura
details: This land is located in Walana, Panadura near to the 'Lyceum Primary International School'. It takes only few minutes to Panadura town. 0.75 perches will be given for free. This land's location is the most valuable advantage for the buyer because it takes only couple of minutes to access any place around Panadura town such as Hospitals, Schools, Banks, Restaurants, Shops etc. For more information Contact us. Prices are negotiable and this land will be sold for the highest offer as soon as possible.
